ValidationRule.description: Relieving Pressure at Inlet is a Mandatory field to be entered by the user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(TEXT( cdcpc__Relieving_Pressure_at_Inlet__c )) )&& ( cdcpc__Bypass__c = FALSE) && ( cdcpc__Sizing_Flag__c = TRUE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Relieving Pressure at Inlet: Please select a value from the drop down
